title: Rise of the Triad (2013) playthrough -- Part 2
description: Finished it up on Hard difficulty. Decided not to do Ludicrous and I'm glad I did, because the game was hard enough on Hard. Pretty fun game, although the glitches and unoptimization of the game was annoying.
